div.p: Albedo anomalies (absolute values) of all sky (left column) and clear sky (right column) conditions during the investigated period. All sky includes both clear and overcast sky condition. The anomalies were calculated by subtraction of the 4-year average. ( a) The albedo anomaly of all sky for 2007, ( b) the albedo anomaly of clear sky for 2007. ( c) Same as ( a) but for 2008, ( d) same as ( b) but for 2008.
